-- 1. What is the total revenue generated by male vs female customers?

Female 75191
Male 157890

-- 2. Which customers used a discount but still spent more than the average purchase amount?



-- 3. Which are the top 5 products with the highest average review rating?


"Gloves"	3.86
"Sandals"	3.84
"Boots"	3.82 
"Hat"	3.80
"Skirt"	3.78


-- 4. Compare the average Purchase Amounts between Standard and Express Shipping

"Standard"	58.46
"Express"	60.48


-- 5. Do subscribed customers spend more? Compare average spend and total revenue between subscribers and non-subscribers

subscription    total customers     avg spend   total revenue
"Yes"	        1053	             59.49	    62645.00
"No"	        2847	             59.87	    170436.00


-- 6. Which 5 products have the highest percentage of purchase with discounts applied?

item purchased  discount rate
"Hat"	        50.00
"Sneakers"	    49.00
"Coat"	        49.00
"Sweater"	    48.00
"Pants"	        47.00


-- 7. Segment customers into New, Returning, and Loyal based on their total number of previous purchases, 
--and show the count of each segment

-- Definitions
-- New = 1 purchase
-- Returning = 2-10 purchases
-- Loyal = > 10 purchases

"Loyal"	3116
"New"	83
"Returning"	701


-- 8. What are the top 3 most purchased products within each category?

item_rank   category        item_purchased      total_orders

1	        "Accessories"	"Jewelry"	        171
2	        "Accessories"	"Sunglasses"	    161
3	        "Accessories"	"Belt"	            161

-- 9. Are customers who are repeat buyers (more than 5 previous purchases) also likely to subscribe?

subscription_status     repeat_buyers
"No"	                2518
"Yes"	                958
